p: Figure 11 compares the trajectories of the value of information in LTA and ATL, i.e., VPIR( t) and VLPR( t) in Eqs. ( 6) and ( 10), respectively. The value of perfect information already appears in the beginning of the twenty-first century whereas those in learning case become apparent in the second half of this century according to the assumption in the uncertainty elimination process. However, the contribution of knowledge accumulation still exceeds 3%.
